// ** Reactstrap Imports import { Input } from 'reactstrap' const PaymentHeader = () => { return (

Pay and Publish

Give your ad a budget as small as 1 Fari or its equivalent in STX. In terms of USD, the minimum budgets is currently about 25 cents.

Bitfari is so cheap, that for about 25 cents you can be featured in aprox. 100 billboards in your area. All the customers matching your keywords will see your ad for pennies. Converting prospects into customers just became as cheap as with online ads, with free branding for your business!!!

) } export default PaymentHeader
